detail_desc: Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and flap leg pockets with a tab and D-rings. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Vest top in airy slub linen jersey with a racer back and rounded hem.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the sleeves and neckline.
Cap in cotton twill with elastication at the back.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit containing glittery threads with a pompom on top and earflaps with ties at the bottom. Fleece lining.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long dolman sleeves, no buttons and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pre-tied tie in chambray made from a cotton blend with an adjustable elastic strap and fastener. Width 4.5 cm.
Short jumper in a soft, loose knit with a knot detail at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with open lacing and pointed toes. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Straight-cut V-neck top in a linen weave with narrow shoulder straps.
Soft cotton jersey bodysuits in different designs with long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Swimsuit with a frill around the neckline and down the shoulder straps at the back. Lined front.
Shorts in lightweight, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, drawstring waist.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a chest pocket, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and flannel bottoms. Top with a round neck and chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, raw edges around the armholes and ribbing at the hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in slightly stretchy cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and slim, straight legs.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gently rounded hem.

Strapless bandeau bra in jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, ribbed trim at the hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Lightly padded baseball jacket in woven fabric with appliqués and imitation leather sleeves in a contrasting colour. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Short, high-waisted skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a drawstring down the front and flounce at the hem. Concealed zip and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Unlined.
Waist belt in grained imitation leather with a round, covered metal buckle. Width approx. 4 cm.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in cotton twill with a small embroidered detail and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and elastication and a flounce at the top and sleeve-ends.
V-neck top in airy, patterned jersey with an elasticated seam under the bust, gathered shoulders and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Patterned jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short, gently fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey crêpe with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Top and leggings with a print motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a brushed finish. Long sleeves with lace sections, and sewn-on lace appliqués at the top and on the elbows.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable ties at the back of the neck, ties at the back, side support and a silicone trim at the top.

V-neck top in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front that fastens with a concealed press-stud and ties at one side. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a flounce at the neckline and seam with a wide flounce at the hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a matching bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Set with a vest top and shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Straight-cut car coat in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and diagonal welt front pockets. Ventilating holes with eyelets under the arms and long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs. One inner pocket with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Lined.

Short dress in a striped weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons at the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs with slits. Detachable belt with D-rings at the waist, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a flounce at the front that continues along the sleeves.
Long kaftan in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and long, wide sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Flounces down the back and front, and a seam with a drawstring at the waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Rounded shoulders, a yoke with a small frill trim and drawstring, and buttoned cuffs.

Short dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar with narrow ties, pleats and a V-neck opening at the front. Gently dropped shoulders, short flutter sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with dungarees and a long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey. Dungarees with adjustable straps with concealed press-studs at the front, a chest and back pocket with a button, and side pockets. Elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Patterned top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Short dress in patterned chiffon with a V-neck, small stand up collar with a tie and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless blouse in softly draping satin with a V-shaped opening at the front and ties at the neckline. Gathered seam at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour trims. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and padded, detachable hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, diagonal side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining in recycled polyester.
Cotton jersey briefs with a lined gusset.
Long nightshirt in a patterned viscose weave with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated hem.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Henley top in soft cotton jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button and a contrasting colour lining on the inside of the cuffs. Slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Velour joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed jersey hems.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width approx. 11.5 cm.
Short, wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a stripe print, V-neck, buttons down the front, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a cotton knit with appliqués. Ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
5-pocket shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist with decorative ties, a fake fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped pull. Discreet pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.

Cold shoulder playsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow, frill-trimmed elastication at the top and an opening with ties at the front. Narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and wide, flounce-trimmed legs. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit. Fitted style with a round neckline, long sleeves and detachable tie belt under the bust.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton poplin with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and scalloped hems with overlocked edges.
Chinos in a pima cotton weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
